name: Rocket Jump!
description:
This game contains elements of platforming and shooting mechanics.

Use your explosive arm to blast your way through the facility, while avoiding lasers and conserving your ammo in this rage-inducing platformer!

Made for Mix and Jam Game Jam 2020

Controls

Space - Shoot

R - Restart Level

KNOWN BUGS

  • Ammo will deplete, even before the shooting cooldown has finished
